/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings and lush greenery. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few wispy clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view.
